animeTitle: Mai no Mahou to Katei no Hi
otherNames: マイの魔法と家庭の日
synopsis: Mai is an 8-year old grade-schooler. She uses "magic" (empathy) to understand the feelings of her family members. However, her elder brother is going through a difficult period due to the onset of puberty and is cutting himself off. In order to deepen the bonds within the family, Mai's father has decreed that every Saturday will be a "Family Day".
